answers.answer: Me! Mine was 141 the 1st time & when I webt back it dropped to 117. Don't worry, just try to watch what you eat a little. Hopefully, yours will go down next time too. ☺

question: I'm 27 weeks and I was wondering if there's anyone who's failed the first diabetic test but passed the second one. My score was a 143 and I'm really worried.
title: diabetes
